summary: Visual, sound and text notification that Muffle has worn off
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=5]Muffle Effect Worn Off Notification[/size][/b]  [size=1]test[/size]

[u]Description[/u]

Simple ScriptDragon plugin to notify when Muffle spell wears off.
Notification includes visual and sound effects from Muffle spell plus text message in the top left corner of the screen.

[u]Installation instructions[/u]

1. Mod needs [url=http://alexander.sannybuilder.com/?category=other&altname=skyrim_script_dragon][b]Script Dragon[/b][/url] to be installed.

2. Copy MuffleWornOff.asi to game\'s root folder.

3. That\'s all :)

[u]Plans (Creation Kit or new ScriptDragon versions)[/u]
Advanced notification (N seconds before effect wears off) or indication (current remaining seconds for every effect).

[u]Version History[/u]

0.1test
- Initial release

[b]My new mod[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12338]Drem Fah Pah Nahl[/url]
author: Mikanoshi
